```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(readr)
ficheros<-list.files(path = "./data", pattern = ".txt", full.names = TRUE)

lista<-c()

for (fichero in ficheros) {
  r <- read_lines(fichero)
  r <- strsplit(r, "/n")
  lista <- append(lista, list(r))
}
```
